name: extendscript-ponyfills
description: Setup for writing libraries for Adobe scripts in TypeScript

scripts.build: npm run spack && npm run types && npm run docs
scripts.spack: npm run es && npm run jsx && npm run jsx-remove-export-lines
scripts.jsx-remove-export-lines: awk '!/^export/' dist/script.jsx > tmp && mv tmp dist/script.jsx
scripts.release: npm run build && gh release create $npm_package_version $npm_package_jsx
scripts.types: rm -rf dist/types/* && npx -p typescript tsc --declaration --emitDeclarationOnly --declarationDir dist/types

author: Martin Lindberg
